DOC.brief_summary: The objective clinical study determine tolerance dietary supplement Valedia ( blend plant extract ) evaluation several parameter : - Various blood biological parameter tolerance ( preprandial ) : blood glucose , insulin , fructosamine , total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL-cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol , oxidize LDL , us-CRP , creatinine , ASAT , ALAT , gGT , phosphatase alcaline , bilirubine , urea . - Urinary parameter : urea , creatinine . - Hemodynamic parameter : heart rate blood pressure . - Cardiac function : ECG . - Weight .
DOC.criteria: Main 25 < = BMI < 30 kg.m2 Main ASAT < = 1,55 microkat/L ALAT < = 1,70 microkat/L gGT < = 2,55 microkat/L 55 < = Creatinine < = 104 micromol/L ( + 10 % ) Bilirubin < 17,1 micromol/L ( + 10 % ) 1,7 < = Urea < = 8,3 mmol/L ( + 10 % ) usCRP < = 5 mg/L ( + 10 % ) 0,70 < = Fasting glycemia < = 1,25 g/L ( + 10 % ) HbA1c < = 6 % Medications diabetes and/or dyslipidemia
